_header: It is I-found in Holy Writ
_description: Six lines assuring pardon to those who say the prayer which follows

BLHar2869.Transcription: Hyt is yfounde in holy wrytThat þe dede seyde to þe quikTher nis noon so foul a holurNe noon so gret a lechourȜif he ofte sey þis orisunOf his synnis he schal haue pardon
BLHar2869.Note: Written entirely in rubric, written as prose.
BLHar2869.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The ‘Arma Christi’ Rolls.” 
             Modern Language Review
         34 (1939): 415-21: 418.
